pageContext.claim: “This is a horrible and very unfair situation [referring to prosecutors’ recommended sentence of nine years for Roger Stone]. The real crimes were on the other side, as nothing happens to them. Cannot allow this miscarriage of justice!”
pageContext.analysis: Stone and other Trump associates pleaded guilty or were convicted by a jury. Trump claims that Hillary Clinton, former FBI director James Comey and others deserved to be charged, but they were investigated by the Justice Department with no charges brought.
